**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 202 1.1 _[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) For Pathfinder Society play, Endemic Herbs does not have the additive trait._ **Archetype** [Herbalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=252) **Prerequisites** [Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6339); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) --- The herbal items you create use medicinal plants endemic to your location. When a creature consumes one of your herbal items, that creature gains the benefit matching the location where you created that item. If the benefit is not immediate, it lasts for 1 minute unless otherwise stated.
  • **Aquatic** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
  • **Arctic** For 1 hour, treat [environmental cold effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=2769) as if they were one step less severe.
  • **Desert** For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.
  • **Forest** Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578) and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) effects.
  • **Mountain** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
  • **Plains** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
  • **Swamp** Remove one source of [persistent](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86) bleed damage.
  • **Underground** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=2298).
